channel.title: Operations on Rishav Mishra
channel.description: Recent content in Operations on Rishav Mishra

item.title: Highradius
item.description: This was my Fifth Internship in College. This internship was completed on 1st of July 2022. Here I was working on a Full Stack analytics project where we were taking Data from Salesforce and then use ETL to bring data to Snowflake a SQL based system which gets connected to Tableau and then using that we make the forecast on the Data provided by other teams. This helped me in learning new things in Analytics Domain and in Operations Team of a Organisation.

item.title: Wipro
item.description: This was my Sixth Internship in College. This internship was completed on 31st of May 2022. Here I was working on a Full Stack java project where we were taking Data from open-source and then use in our website to bring data to SQL based system which gets connected to server and then using that we make the website to book Movie Booking System.
